hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export VMNAME="WS-$$" /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init login /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init build /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init start /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'wget http://esb.metacentrum.cz/rsyslog2.git/bootstrap.install.sh && sh -x bootstrap.install.sh' ################ /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh phase2.install.sh'
/puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh rediser.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh rediser/tests/rediser.sh'
/puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh elk.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x elk/tests/elk.sh'
/puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh warden3-server.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh warden3/tests/warden-ca.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh warden3/tests/warden-server.sh'
/puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh warden3-2rediser.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh warden3/tests/warden-2rediser.sh'
/puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh hpcowrie.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh hpcowrie/tests/hpcowrie.sh'
